mapper.select: select * from t_attribute_link t where 1=1 order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from (select 1 from t_attribute_link t where 1=1 ) a
select * from t_attribute_link t where 1=1 and productID=#{productID} order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_attribute_link ( id ,attrID ,productID ,value ) values ( id ,#{attrID} ,#{productID} ,#{value} )
mapper.update: update t_attribute_link set id=#{id} ,attrID=#{attrID} ,productID=#{productID} ,value=#{value} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.attrID "attrid", t.productID "productid", t.value "value" from t_attribute_link t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_attribute_link where 1=1 and id=#{id}
delete from t_attribute_link where 1=1 and id=#{id} and productID=#{productID} and attrID=#{attrID}
delete from t_attribute_link where attrID in (SELECT id FROM t_attribute where pid=#{id})
